text: (Ej Pajomʙar, cun ʙa qasdi ƣanimathoi ƣazvai Xajʙar ravona suded,) ʙa zudi ʙarcojmondagon xohand guft: Bigzored moro to ʙo sumo ravem (sui Xajʙar). Mexohand taƣjir ʙidihand va'dai Allohro. Bigu hargiz naraved ʙo mo (sui Xajʙar): zero Alloh ʙa mo pes az omadanamon (ʙa sui Madina,) gufta ʙud, (ki hamono ƣanimathoi Xajʙar, az oni on saxest, ki dar Hudajʙija istirok kardaast.) Pas (munofiqon) xohand guft: Ne, Alloh cunin amr nakardaast sumoro, ʙalki sumo hasadu ʙaxili mekuned ʙa mo. Ne! (voqe'an cunin nest), ʙalki haqiqat in ast, ki munofiqon ʙa cuz andake cize darjoftani nadorand, ci ciz dar din ʙarojason foida meorad va ci ciz zarar
